title: test/bench/shootout: build deletes fasta-1000.out incorrectly
body:
After building tip (782eea0190381b849e8e4b82bef46c1e3f281f97) test/bench/shootout/fasta-1000.out is removed.  This has the undesired side effect of having to "git stash && git stash drop" (or your favorite git magic to undo this) before a git pull can be issued.  Not a huge issue but a regression for sure.

This is new behavior.  I build go tip every morning (CST) and this did not happen yesterday.  I tested this on OSX and bitrig/OpenBSD.

The resulting diff is:
```
diff --git a/test/bench/shootout/fasta-1000.out b/test/bench/shootout/fasta-1000.out
deleted file mode 100644
index f1caba0..0000000
--- a/test/bench/shootout/fasta-1000.out
```
